Description: Limestone ostracon: on the recto eleven partly faded lines of an administrative text pertaining to the distribution of rations to the work-force. On the verso scanty remains of one line of indiscernible text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136377) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136377)
